ghost

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Character
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ambusher, Chaser, Ignorant, Whim

    public abstract class Ghost
extends java.lang.Object
implements Character

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ghost(java.lang.String type, processing.core.PImage image, Waka waka, int targetX, int targetY, processing.core.PImage fImage, processing.core.PImage sImage)
      Store ghost intial position, ghost x/y pixels, all image of ghost in different mode, ghost current image,ghost x/y coordinate frameRate, ghost previous mode, duration scatter mode, duration chaser mode, ghost speed, duration frighten mode, direction of ghost, ghost target x/y and indicate to draw line.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int checkBoundX(int num)
      Return 27 if Xcoordinate of ghost target more than 27, return 0 if Xcoordinate of ghost target less than 0 and return number if its between 0 and 27.
      int checkBoundY(int num)
      Return 35 if Ycoordinate of ghost target more than 35, return 0 if Ycoordinate of ghost target less than 0 and return number if its between 0 and 35.
      int checkDiffX()
      Find the difference between ghost target Xcoordinate and ghost Xcoordinate.
      int checkDiffY()
      Find the difference between ghost target Ycoordinate and ghost Ycoordinate.
      boolean checkIntersection(Map map)
      Return true if the ghost is in the intersection, return false if ghost is not in the intersection.
      void checkNextMove(Map map)
      Check ghost next move when ghost reach an intersection, by predicting the ghost future move and Calculate their future position with target position using the euclidean distance formula.
      abstract void checkTarget()
      Set ghost target Xcoordinate and Ycoordinate based on each ghost behaviour.
      boolean checkWakaCollision()
      Check collision between waka and ghost by this formula.
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
      Draw Ghost in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels add offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels add offset.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(java.lang.String type,
             processing.core.PImage image,
             Waka waka,
             int targetX,
             int targetY,
             processing.core.PImage fImage,
             processing.core.PImage sImage)
        Store ghost intial position, ghost x/y pixels, all image of ghost in different mode, ghost current image,ghost x/y coordinate frameRate, ghost previous mode, duration scatter mode, duration chaser mode, ghost speed, duration frighten mode, direction of ghost, ghost target x/y and indicate to draw line.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of ghost.
        image - Image of ghost in normal mode.
        waka - Waka object.
        fImage - Image of ghost on frighten mode.
        sImage - Image of ghost on soda mode.
        targetX - Initial target of ghost (Corner of map (Xcoordinate)).
        targetY - Initial target of ghost (Corner of map (Ycoordinate)).

      • setGhostPosition

        public void setGhostPosition(Map map,
                             int num,
                             char symbol)
        Find the ghost position based on symbol given and check if the num and count must be the same to assign the ghost position.

        num and count are used to allowed same ghost type to have different starting coordinates.

        Parameters:
        map - Object where walls and fruit being placed, stored and use as background for the waka.
        num - Number to indicate ghost number of that type.
        symbol - Symbol representation of ghost in the map.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method reset ghost when they collide with waka

        Reset ghost by pixels of ghost to 0, Ycoodrinate/tile to starting Y, Xcoordinate/tile to starting X, direction of ghost to Left, mode of ghost tp scatter, framerate of ghost to 0 and both pixels to 0.

        Specified by:
        reset in interface Character

      • setGraphic

        public void setGraphic()
        Set ghost graphic/image based on their mode.
        Specified by:
        setGraphic in interface Character

      • checkWakaCollision

        public boolean checkWakaCollision()
        Check collision between waka and ghost by this formula. Return true when the formula form both ghost and waka equal

        Formula for waka X/Y = floor division((waka pixels + waka coordinate * 16) / 16) Formula for ghost X/Y = floor division((ghost pixels + ghost coordinate * 16) / 16)

        Returns:
        True if waka and ghost has the same formula X/Y.

      • checkBoundX

        public int checkBoundX(int num)
        Return 27 if Xcoordinate of ghost target more than 27, return 0 if Xcoordinate of ghost target less than 0 and return number if its between 0 and 27.
        Parameters:
        num - Waka target Xcoordinate.
        Returns:
        Number in range of 0-27.

      • checkBoundY

        public int checkBoundY(int num)
        Return 35 if Ycoordinate of ghost target more than 35, return 0 if Ycoordinate of ghost target less than 0 and return number if its between 0 and 35.
        Parameters:
        num - Waka target Ycoordinate.
        Returns:
        Number in range of 0-35.

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(JsonParser parse,
                      int i,
                      int j)
        Set ghost speed, ghost duration (scatter,frighten,chase) taken from JsonParser object.
        Parameters:
        parse - Object of JsonParser.
        i - Index of modeLength.
        j - Index of modeLength.

      • checkIntersection

        public boolean checkIntersection(Map map)
        Return true if the ghost is in the intersection, return false if ghost is not in the intersection.
        Parameters:
        map - Object where walls and fruit being placed, stored and use as background for the waka.
        Returns:
        True if in intersection otherwise false.

      • checkDiffX

        public int checkDiffX()
        Find the difference between ghost target Xcoordinate and ghost Xcoordinate.
        Returns:
        The difference between them.

      • checkDiffY

        public int checkDiffY()
        Find the difference between ghost target Ycoordinate and ghost Ycoordinate.
        Returns:
        The difference between them.

      • checkTarget

        public abstract void checkTarget()
        Set ghost target Xcoordinate and Ycoordinate based on each ghost behaviour.

      • checkNextMove

        public void checkNextMove(Map map)
        Check ghost next move when ghost reach an intersection, by predicting the ghost future move and Calculate their future position with target position using the euclidean distance formula. Put the distance into a map with the direction as the key, then take the smallest value from the map, set ghost direction as the key of the smallest value. This allowed only if the next tile is not a solid and the direction
        Specified by:
        checkNextMove in interface Character
        Parameters:
        map - Object where walls and fruit being placed, stored and use as background for the waka.

      • turn

        public void turn(Map map)
        This method change the direction of ghost if its detect turn/corner. This method also check the ghost future tile.
        Parameters:
        map - Object where walls and fruit being placed, stored and use as background for the waka.

      • tick

        public void tick(Map map)
        Change the mode if the duration of each mode already reached, and store the current mode into previous mode. This method check the next tile, whether if its a solid or not. If its not a solid the ghost is allowed to add/subtract its xPixels/yPixels (based on ghost direction).

        If xPixels/yPixels have reach 16 ,it reset back the pixels to 0 and add/subtract Xcoordinate/Ycoordinate of ghost by speed of ghost (based on ghost direction).

        If ghost has reach an intersection ghost check for next move or else ghost try to turn.

        If ghost not in frighten mode it will check for the ghost target position.

        Specified by:
        tick in interface Character
        Parameters:
        map - Object where walls and fruit being placed, stored and use as background for the waka.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draw Ghost in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels add offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels add offset.

        Draw line if ghost is not in frighten mode

        Specified by:
        draw in interface Character
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet object.
